targets.rawSql:
with range_counts_ts as (
    select time_bucket_gapfill('4h', datetime) as time,
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[1])) as "01) < $0",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[2])) as "02) = $0",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[3])) as "03) ($0 ; $10)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[4])) as "04) [$10 ; $100)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[5])) as "05) [$100 ; $1k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[6])) as "06) [$1k ; $5k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[7])) as "07) [$5k ; $10k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[8])) as "08) [$10k ; $25k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[9])) as "09) [$25k ; $50k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[10])) as "10) [$50k ; $100k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[11])) as "11) [$100k ; $500k)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[12])) as "12) [$500k ; $1m)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[13])) as "13) [$1m ; $10m)",
        locf(sum(balance_usd_ranges_counts[14])) as "14) +$10m"
    from data_report.vault_stats_4h_ts
    where $__timeFilter(datetime)
      and chain = '$chain'
      and vault_id in ($vault_id)
    group by 1
    order by 1
)
select *
from range_counts_ts
where "01) < $0" is not null

panels.title: Investment size group by user by vault

panels.title: Investment size group by user by vault

list.definition: select distinct vault_id from data_raw.vault where chain = '$chain'
list.name: vault_id
list.query: select distinct vault_id from data_raw.vault where chain = '$chain'
